author: MarketScreener
title: Almacenamiento de electricidad para coches eléctricos: la carga en dos direcciones tiene potencial - MarketScreener
text:
ESSEN (dpa-AFX) - Según un estudio de Eon, los coches eléctricos tienen un gran potencial como sistemas de almacenamiento de electricidad para los hogares. La empresa energética con sede en Essen publicó un análisis según el cual los coches eléctricos con una tecnología especial de baterías podrían almacenar matemáticamente en conjunto electricidad suficiente para abastecer de energía a 1,75 millones de hogares durante doce horas. Eon se refiere a los aproximadamente 166.000 coches eléctricos matriculados en Alemania que están preparados para la carga bidireccional ("bidi-ready").
Se trata de almacenar en la batería del coche la electricidad generada por un sistema fotovoltaico instalado en el tejado del propietario, por ejemplo. Posteriormente, la electricidad del coche aparcado delante de la casa fluye hacia ésta para cubrir las necesidades energéticas de la misma. Por tanto, la batería no sólo se utiliza para propulsar el coche, sino que también se convierte en un dispositivo de almacenamiento temporal para que el usuario dependa algo menos de la energía de la red eléctrica.
Los hogares podrían depender menos de la red eléctrica
Hasta ahora, la carga bidireccional ha sido un nicho de mercado. Según la Autoridad Federal de Transporte Motorizado, en Alemania hay 60,7 millones de vehículos matriculados. Por tanto, los 166.000 coches "bidi-ready" mencionados por Eon -principalmente modelos de fabricantes asiáticos- sólo representan alrededor del 0,3% de todo el parque automovilístico alemán.
"Actualmente se está probando un uso integral de la tecnología a escala nacional", afirma Filip Thon, director de Eon, y se muestra partidario de utilizar la batería de los coches eléctricos "no sólo para conducir, sino como parte integrada de nuestro sistema energético". El análisis de Eon es un experimento mental que pone de relieve el gran potencial de esta tecnología aún joven./wdw/DP/zb

author: Charles Hilu
title: Take Control of Texas National Guard, Democrats Urge Biden
text: Texas Democrats in Congress this week urged President Joe Biden to take control of the Texas National Guard in response to Gov. Greg Abbott's (R.) refusal to give up control of a section of the state's southern border. "Governor Greg Abbott is using the Texas National Guard to obstruct and create chaos at the border," Rep. Joaquin Castro [said](https://twitter.com/JoaquinCastrotx/status/1749917713864982734?s=20) Tuesday on X. "If Abbott is defying yesterday's Supreme Court ruling, @POTUS needs to establish sole federal control of the Texas National Guard now." "I agree with @JoaquinCastrotx: if Abbott is defying yesterday's Supreme Court ruling, @POTUS needs to establish sole federal control of the Texas National Guard," Rep. Greg Casar [posted](https://twitter.com/RepCasar/status/1750262337049632968?s=20) to X Wednesday afternoon. Presidents have the authority under certain circumstances to federalize state National Guard troops, such as when President Dwight D. Eisenhower took control of the Arkansas National Guard to integrate a school in Little Rock. Such occurrences are rare, however. Castro and Casar's posts came in response to Abbott's [insistence](https://freebeacon.com/latest-news/texas-will-not-back-down-governor-says-after-supreme-court-rules-against-state-on-border-wire/) that "Texas is not backing down" after the Supreme Court [temporarily allowed](https://freebeacon.com/latest-news/supreme-court-says-biden-admin-can-cut-texass-border-wire-fencing/) the Biden administration to cut razor wire the state had erected. During the case's litigation, the Texas National Guard [seized](https://freebeacon.com/latest-news/texas-blocks-federal-agents-from-section-of-border/) control of a 2.5-mile stretch of the border that includes Eagle Pass, a highly trafficked crossing point. Published under: [ border ](https://freebeacon.com/tag/border/) , [ Democrats ](https://freebeacon.com/tag/democrats/) , [ Greg Abbott ](https://freebeacon.com/tag/greg-abbott/) , [ Illegal Immigration ](https://freebeacon.com/tag/illegal-immigration/) , [ Texas ](https://freebeacon.com/tag/texas/)

organizations.name: take control of texas national guard

author: @Web Desk
title: 'Interfaith' Sita-Akbar lion couple to get new monikers over fear of Hindu-Muslim riots
text: Friday, February 23, 2024 A zoo in West Bengal, India, has been directed by a court to change the names of an 'interfaith' lion couple following objections from a hardline Hindu group, the Vishwa Hindu Parishad (VHP), claiming the names were offensive to their religious sentiments, BBC reported. The lioness, initially named after the Hindu deity Sita, and the lion, named Akbar after the 16th-century Mughal ruler, Jalal-ud-din Muhammad Akbar, sparked a legal dispute over alleged blasphemy. The VHP, associated with Prime Minister Narendra Modi's Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP), contended that naming the lioness after a goddess was blasphemous and protested against keeping the lions in the same wildlife park. The court ruling stated that animals should not be named after figures from Hindu gods, Muslim Prophets, revered Christian personalities, Nobel laureates, or freedom fighters. Justice Saugata Bhattacharya questioned the choice of names, suggesting alternatives like "Bijli" (lightning) to avoid controversy. The court also pondered on the appropriateness of naming pets, including dogs, after individuals. The VHP, asserting the sacred significance of Sita in Hindu beliefs, deemed the naming act as blasphemy and an assault on the religious sentiments of Hindus across the world. The organisation accused West Bengal authorities, governed by an opposition party, of intentional actions and threatened protests unless the names and locations of the lions were changed. VHP spokesperson Vinod Bansal emphasised that Sita and Akbar should not coexist and called for the relocation of the big cats along with a change in their names. The court's decision to intervene reflects the intersection of cultural and religious sensitivities surrounding the naming of animals in the Indian context.

author: @WBAY
title: Green Bay City Council approves Red Smith neighborhood development
text:
Green Bay City Council approves Red Smith neighborhood development
Published: Apr. 16, 2025 at 4:47 PM CDT|Updated: 16 minutes ago
GREEN BAY, Wis. (WBAY) - The Green Bay City Council approves a proposed development across the street from Red Smith K-8 School.
That means more houses, duplexes, and apartments are coming to the area, as well as commercial space.
This comes despite concerns about too many people moving into the neighborhood and the ecological impact it could have on the area.

author: Fernanda de Oliveira Ribeiro
title: Cerca de 25% do território da Ucrânia está contaminado com minas e engenhos explosivos
text:
Desde o início da invasão, as forças russas têm deixado um rasto de minas e engenhos explosivos por detonar, na Ucrânia. Agora é preciso abrir caminho para os militares de Zelensky ganharem terreno ao inimigo. Preparam-se para esta perigosa e difícil tarefa homens, mulheres e cães.
“Tencionamos trabalhar nas regiões de Kharkiv e Mykolaiv. A experiência que adquiri no estrangeiro vai ajudar-me muito. Sei como é um campo minado, já lá estive, vi-o com os meus olhos, vivi essa experiência. Quando entro num campo de minas com equipamento de proteção, com a mochila às costas e a passear o cão, já sei que as minas antitanque, antipessoal ou qualquer outro tipo de engenhos explosivos podem estar em qualquer lugar”, diz Karina Buchma, treinadora de cães.
O treino vai decorrer no Camboja e durar 5 meses. O recurso aos cães é importante porque um destes animais, devidamente treinado, poderá inspecionar até 1.500 metros quadrados de terreno, por dia, e uma pessoa só conseguirá fazê-lo em 20 a 50 metros quadrados .
“Existe mais do que uma abordagem para a desminagem na Ucrânia. Haverá várias formas que podem ser exploradas e esta é uma de muitas outras que estamos a fazer. Também trabalhamos em zonas em que usamos drones e outras inovações que ajudam a desbravar terreno com a maior rapidez possível. Esperamos que este seja um investimento a longo prazo no futuro da Ucrânia e dos seus cidadãos”, Jaco Cilliers, do programa da ONU para desenvolvimento.
A iniciativa conjunta do Programa das Nações Unidas e de organizações sem fins lucrativos, visa desminar as regiões de Mykolaiv, Kherson e Kharkiv. Cerca de 25% do território da Ucrânia está minado, tornando-o, neste momento, o país mais minado do mundo.

author: FE Lifestyle
title: In Images and Videos | Extravagant assets owned by Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan, boasting a colossal net worth of Rs 1685 crore - Lifestyle News | The Financial Express
text: Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan stand as the epitome of Bollywood’s power couple, celebrated for their remarkable careers. With a trajectory of professional triumphs, it’s no surprise that the duo has amassed substantial wealth over the years.As reported by CNBC TV18, Saif Ali Khan commands an impressive net worth exceeding Rs 1200 crore, while Kareena Kapoor Khan’s net worth is estimated at Rs 485 crore. Together, their combined wealth reaches an astounding Rs 1685 crore, with a significant portion derived from real estate, film ventures, and lucrative brand endorsements.Saif Ali Khan reportedly earned a handsome sum of Rs 12 crore for his role in Adipurush, according to News18. Meanwhile, Kareena Kapoor Khan commands a fee ranging from Rs 10 to 12 crore per movie. As one of the highest-paid actresses in Bollywood and one of the top earners in the OTT domain, Saif and Kareena have solidified their financial standing. 5 Ultra-Expensive Assets Owned by the Power Couple A significant part of Saif Ali Khan’s wealth is attributed to the Pataudi Palace, the family home spread across 10 acres of land with a staggering 150 rooms. Frequent holiday retreats for the Khan-Kapoor family, including Saif, Kareena, and their children Taimur and Jeh, make this luxurious mansion a cherished asset. Notably, scenes from Ranbir Kapoor’s “Animal” and Soha Ali Khan’s “Rang De Basanti” were filmed at the Pataudi Palace.Post-marriage, the couple resided in a multi-crore apartment at Fortune Heights, Bandra, Mumbai. After over a decade, they upgraded to a more opulent residence in Satguru Sharan, estimated at over Rs 103 crore, according to GQ. Kareena often shares glimpses of their Bandra abode, where numerous social gatherings take place.Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan’s penchant for luxury cars is evident in their impressive collection, including a Mercedes-Benz S-Class S 350d, a Land Rover Defender 110, an Audi Q7 , and a Jeep Wrangler, among others. Their automobile ensemble reflects a taste for extravagance and sophistication.Kareena’s exquisite solitaire diamond engagement ring, costing a noteworthy Rs 75 lakh, remains a symbol of elegance. A trademark accessory in her fashionable ensembles, the ring became a focal point of attention when she tied the knot with Saif Ali Khan in 2012.Known for her love of luxury, Kareena Kapoor Khan boasts an enviable collection of high-end bags, including a Hermès Birkin Bag, a Chanel Classic Flap Bag, a Louis Vuitton Monogram Metis Empreinte Hobo Bag, and a Bottega Veneta Nero Intrecciato Nappa Tote. These prestigious accessories contribute to her sophisticated style.In essence, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan’s expansive net worth is reflected not only in their professional accomplishments but also in their possession of these extravagant assets that signify a lifestyle steeped in luxury.

author: arhuaco
title: #10 Muere Manuel Elkin Patarroyo, científico colombiano conocido por su investigación en vacunas
text:
Muere Manuel Elkin Patarroyo, científico colombiano conocido por su investigación en vacunas
por a publicado:
El científico colombiano Manuel Elkin Patarroyo, conocido por sus investigaciones sobre vacunas, ha muerto este jueves a los 78 años. Oriundo del pequeño municipio de Ataco, en el departamento del Tolima, Patarroyo fue uno de los científicos más conocidos del país. Galardonado en 1994 con el Premio Príncipe de Asturias por su labor científica, y en 2010 con el Premio Sabino Arana, fue reconocido en los años noventa como descubridor de la primera vacuna sintética contra la malaria, cuyos derechos cedió a la Organización Mundial de la Salud.
|
#4Sin duda. Esta es una de esas personas que tendríamos que conocer todos. Espero que llegue a portada, sería de un sintomático insoportable que no lo hiciera y que mañana viésemos en ella la muerte de Paquirrin.
#1Cuantas vidas salvará incluso después de muerto, que gente tan maravillosa
#2Y seguirá salvando
No, no fue efectiva. Ver .
Y este estudio, por ejemplo.
La vacuna no funcionó, no fue lo suficientemente efectiva para ser útil.
Mató muchos monos del Amazonas, obtenidos de forma ilegal. Tráfico de fauna.
En su universidad no es una persona querida por muchos porque es considerado un fraude.
Durante el pico COVID anunció que haría una vacuna para todas las variantes, una declaración así de la nada.
Como colombiano mi opinión es que hay muchos colombianos para admirar pero él no era uno.
Que descanse en paz, eso sí.

#10No estoy de acuerdo contigo. La vacuna contra la Malaria de Elkin Patarroyo tenía en aquella época una efectividad de cerca del 50% y en niños menores de 5 años llegaba a una efectividad del 70%. El problema que hubo fue en la comercialización de la vacuna. Elkin la donó a la OMS para su uso gratuito pero en ese momento se prefirió la opción menos efectiva que estaba desarrollando Bill Gates precisamente porque con ésta si se podía comercializar. En resumen: Chapó por el profesor Elkin Patarroyo y ojalá hubiesen muchos como él.
